name: Trap The Alien New
description:
This is a simple game with simple rules. Just trap the Alien within the matrix of Green Spaceship. But it’s not gone be easy because Alien is smart enough…
Just tap on the Green Spaceship and they will turn to Red Spaceship. The Alien is blocked by these Red colored Spaceship.
Surround the Alien with the Red colored Spaceship before it escapes!
